about_the_game:
Breach is a third person action RPG with fast paced co-op combat. With RPG-like depth and an open class system, players can improve and customize their ideal hero as they battle against ever-changing challenges in fantastic, handcrafted dungeons. Play solo, co-op, or as the enemy in frantic, short-burst missions that change every time.

The Breach Starter Pack is your ticket into Steam Early Access, where you can choose from dozens of classes and switch to any class at any time. With the Breach Starter Pack, you’ll be able to participate as the game grows and expands, and gain immediate access to the following classes:

  • Arcane Mender Hero Class
  • Assassin Hero Class
  • Demon Hunter Hero Class
  • Gunslinger Hero Class
  • Mana Warrior Hero Class
  • Necromancer Hero Class
  • Worldshaper Veil Demon Class

In addition to the classes above, you’ll also earn special bonuses in the form of an Academy Weapon Skin Pack (with one weapon for each of the Hero Classes above), and a 30 Day XP and Gold Boost, allowing you to endlessly customize your favorite class by improving your character to complement your teammates or counter whatever your enemy throws at you.

Welcome to the Dungeon Brawl.

Breach is a third person action RPG with fast paced co-op combat. With RPG-like depth and an open class system, players can improve and customize their ideal hero as they battle against ever-changing challenges in fantastic, handcrafted dungeons. Play solo, co-op, or as the enemy in frantic, short-burst missions that change every time.

The Breach Starter Pack is your ticket into Steam Early Access, where you can choose from dozens of classes and switch to any class at any time. With the Breach Starter Pack, you’ll be able to participate as the game grows and expands, and gain immediate access to the following classes:

  • Arcane Mender Hero Class
  • Assassin Hero Class
  • Demon Hunter Hero Class

In addition to the classes above, you’ll also earn special bonuses in the form of an Academy Weapon Skin Pack (with one weapon for each of the Hero Classes above), and a 30 Day XP and Gold Boost, allowing you to endlessly customize your favorite class by improving your character to complement your teammates or counter whatever your enemy throws at you.

Welcome to the Dungeon Brawl.

name: Breach - Starter DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel Nehalem Processor (ex, Core i3/i5/i7)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or ATI Radeon 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel Nehalem Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.5 GB Nvidia GTX 660 or ATI Radeon 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: The Breach Starter Pack is your ticket into Steam Early Access, earning you seven unique classes among dozens upon release.
